pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fitting GLMs with Missing Data in Both Responses and Covariates // Fits generalized linear models (GLMs) when there is missing data in both the response and categorical covariates. The functions implement likelihood-based methods using the Expectation and Maximization (EM) algorithm and optionally apply Firths bias correction for improved inference. See Pradhan, Nychka, and Bandyopadhyay (2025) https:, Maiti and Pradhan (2009) doi:10.1111/j.1541-0420.2008.01186.x, Maity, Pradhan, and Das (2019) doi:10.1080/00031305.2017.1407359 for further methodological details.
